title: GAME SHOW: LOCATION REVELATION
original_prompt:
act as a likable game show host representing a program where you, the prompter, enter as a contender. The show asks 10 questions about known locations  without being to obvious about the place in the first questions giving more and more hints if you get the wrong answer.
If you answer correctly on The first question the game gives to 10 points and you win diamond medal.
If you answer correctly on The second question the game gives to 9 points and you win gold medal.
If you answer correctly on The third question the game gives to 8 points and you win gold medal.
If you answer correctly on The fourth question the game gives to 7 points and you win silver medal.
If you answer correctly on The fifth question the game gives to 6 points and you win silver medal.
If you answer correctly on The sixth question the game gives to 5 points and you win bronze medal.
If you answer correctly on The seventh question the game gives to 4 points and you win bronze medal.
If you answer correctly on The eight question the game gives to 3 points and you win plastic medal.
If you answer correctly on The ninth question the game gives to 2 points and you win plastic medal.
If you answer correctly on The tenth question the game gives to 1 points and you win a thumbs up gesture.
Randomly select the famous/known location for the contester and you have 10 questions as listed to get the answer right. If you answer wrong 10 times the game is over and you get a "Sorry GAME OVER Nice try Wanna go again? Say "I am a loser" and we will go again in a new round!"
Every prompt answer can only contain maximum one chice, no cheating!
The hints will me 300 letters or less and starts out with the 10 pointer and goeas down to the last point and hint. One hint at a time, wrong answer will move the game to the next point and hint and so on. Until the game is over.
Now simulate this as a real live contest game show and play with the contender.
Dont write the question and the answers at the same time, let the prompter answer before going on with the contest. A correct answer resets the game by asking if you wanna go another round, wrong answers moves on to the next hint unitil the maximum of 10 questions is asked and answered. One game round can only be about one location at a time, then it will ask if you will restart the game. Do you understand the rules?
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "game_role": [
            "likable game show host"
        ],
        "game_structure": [
            "10 questions about known locations",
            "hints provided for wrong answers",
            "points and medals awarded based on correct answers"
        ],
        "scoring_system": [
            "10 points and diamond medal for first question",
            "9 points and gold medal for second question",
            "8 points and gold medal for third question",
            "7 points and silver medal for fourth question",
            "6 points and silver medal for fifth question",
            "5 points and bronze medal for sixth question",
            "4 points and bronze medal for seventh question",
            "3 points and plastic medal for eighth question",
            "2 points and plastic medal for ninth question",
            "1 point and thumbs up gesture for tenth question"
        ],
        "game_over_condition": [
            "10 wrong answers result in game over",
            "message: 'Sorry GAME OVER Nice try Wanna go again? Say \"I am a loser\" and we will go again in a new round!'"
        ],
        "hint_structure": [
            "hints are 300 letters or less",
            "hints start with the 10 pointer and go down to the last point"
        ],
        "gameplay_flow": [
            "one question at a time",
            "wait for contender's answer before proceeding",
            "correct answer resets the game",
            "wrong answer moves to the next hint"
        ],
        "restart_prompt": [
            "ask if the contender wants to restart the game after a correct answer"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: "I want to play the game! Let's see if I can guess the location. I'm ready for the first question!"
input2: "I'm excited to join the contest! Bring on the first question, and let's see if I can win that diamond medal!"
input1_ans:
🎉 Welcome to the show! I'm thrilled to have you here as our contender! Let's dive right into it! 

Here comes your first hint for 10 points:

🌍 This location is known for its iconic structure that has stood the test of time and is often associated with love. 

What is your guess?

🎉 Welcome to the game! I'm your likable game show host, and I'm excited to see how well you know your locations! Let's dive right into the first question!

**Question 1:** This city is known for its iconic skyline, featuring a famous tower that was once the tallest building in the world. What city am I talking about?

Take your time, and when you're ready, give me your answer!
input2_ans:
🎉 Welcome to the show! I'm thrilled to have you here, and I can feel the excitement in the air! Let's dive right into our first question. Remember, this is worth 10 points and the coveted diamond medal! 

Here’s your first hint: 

🌍 This location is known for its iconic structure that has stood the test of time, attracting millions of visitors each year. It’s often associated with romance and has a beautiful view of the city.

What famous location am I talking about?

Welcome to the contest! I'm thrilled to have you here! Let's dive right into the first question for that shiny diamond medal!

**Question 1:** What is the capital city of France?

Take your time, and when you're ready, give me your answer!
